1.0.2.name: wordpress/posts-by-taxonomy-widget
1.0.2.description: This plugin will provide a widget that allows you to display a list of terms from any custom (or built-in) taxonomy with a list of recent posts filed in each term. The terms are displayed in a list with each term's posts shown in a nested list.
